course_description: This class covers a variety of topics regarding the nature, causes, prosecution, and consequences of war. Specific topics discussed include counterinsurgency, deterrence, public opinion and war, economic development and war, democracy and war, civil-military relations, civil war, ethnicity and war.
prerequisites: POLS 110 or POLS_OX 110 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2018, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: D. Reiter, Status: Open
